title: Junior Cambrian
description: An innovative Learning Management System (LMS) with gamification features designed to enhance student engagement. Includes interactive lessons, progress tracking, achievement badges, and collaborative learning tools.

title: Sydrix AI
description: Smart Study Management AI platform that personalizes learning experiences through intelligent content recommendations, study schedule optimization, and performance analytics for enhanced academic success.

title: Hello Chatkhil
description: A comprehensive medical and blood donation application serving the Chatkhil community. Features emergency blood request system, health consultations, medical records management, and volunteer network.

title: ISTT University
description: Institute of Science, Trade & Technology (ISTT) routine management system. Streamlines academic scheduling, class management, faculty coordination, and student notifications for enhanced educational administration.

title: Sikhboi
description: A comprehensive application for digital learners featuring interactive courses, skill assessments, certification programs, and personalized learning paths. Designed to democratize quality education access.

title: Bandhu Ai
description: A social networking platform designed to connect communities and foster meaningful relationships. Features include community groups, event management, local business directory, and social commerce.
